name: Squids in Tomato Sauce and Red Wine
description: Use your favorite tomato sauce or spaghetti. This dish can be served as a side dish, appetizer or pasta, a recipe of Italian origin.

name: Home-made Gnocchi
description: An Italian pasta whose main ingredient is potatoes, enjoy them with your favorite Italian sauce.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: The Bolognese sauce of this dish has, in addition to the traditional ingredients, bacon and chopped mushrooms.

name: Spaghetti with garlic and olive oil
description: Simply spaghetti with garlic and olive oil, served with a parmesan cheese and a touch of chili.

name: Lasagna with spinach and feta cheese
description: Absolutely delicious! This lasagna (or cannelloni, if you prefer) of spinach and feta cheese is a house favorite.
